tagline: A quick Chatbot made with python for school
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
Kobayashi

By ultrazoid_

Current Version: InDev 1.3.2

KOBAYASHI IS NOW DISCONTINUED. ULTRAZOID_ IS NOW WORKING ON A NEW CHATBOT KNOWN AS KLAPPEREN.

WHEN THE CHATBOT HAS A WORKING VERSION IT WILL BE RELEASED ON A WEBSITE(TO BE RELEASED SOON)

Current Issues Being looked At:

  • Input not interacting with all lists
  • Log not always writing
    • SOLUTION:
    • If the program crashes the file will not save

Change Log

InDev 1.3.2
WARNING: THIS VERSION IS NOT COMPLETELY WORKING
  • Enabled possibility of 'add-ons' by make end point of random len
  • Fixed 'only' errors
  • Re-did greetings list
  • Continued moving lists out of main .py file
InDev 1.3.1
  • Removed 3.67GB .txt file
  • Fixed Memory error due to said .txt file
  • Began moving lists out of main .py file
  • Fixed Read error
Indev 1.2:
  • Changed file directory for Logs
  • Added Logchecker.py for checking Logs
Indev 1.1:
  • Added Log Ouput
  • Fixed List test crash error
Indev 1.0
  • First Version
name: Kobayashi
